short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically shorten the active tab URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows users to shorten the URL of the currently active tab in their browser. The shortened URL is automatically copied to the clipboard, making it easy for users to share links quickly. The extension integrates with the custom shortening service hosted on shorter-url-karim.vercel.app. With one click, users can get a shareable, shortened URL for any webpage they are browsing.
